ActorTalk: My head's spinning. I had a strange dream.
At the end of it... something appeared.
Feels strange... like I've seen those scenes before...
A message from Lucia. Right, we agreed to watch the Froggie movie today.
It's for you, Commandant. I hope it brings you good luck.
Oh, and ribbit, when we see Mama Mole, don't mention anything about the "loop."
